name: Surf's Up (itch) (watto)
description:
After a bad wipe-out, a young surfer is forced to seek help from an unlikely source...

A short and sweet otome game! Date a shark! Live your dreams! 

-----------------------------------

Characters

Sam: A young surfer whose competitive and reckless nature can, more often than not, get her into trouble. After a painful accident, she needs somebody to fix her surfboard before the upcoming competition. 

Bellamy: The centre of the town's rumourmill, this intimidating mutant makes his home in a secluded beachside shack - a place that people will usually go out of their way to avoid. While he is widely considered to be dangerous and bloodthirsty, a lesser-known rumour suggests he's also pretty handy at fixing surfboards...

Maddie: Talented. Beautiful. Strong. She is not only Sam's ULTIMATE RIVAL, but also a source of great envy for many in the town. 

Alex: Sam's best friend. Absolutely useless. 

-----------------------------------

A lot of this game is still just me experimenting and having fun with the game engine, but I'm pretty proud with how it came out. We all need some sexy shark men in our lives, amiright? I love reading your comments! So please let me know how I did with this one below <3

* Please note: This game contains instances of violence and depictions of mental illness. Player discretion advised.
